Banner.Description:

From architecting solid backend systems in .NET to tackling front-end interfaces, I bring comprehensive end-to-end expertise to the table.
AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: üíª A backend-heavy full-stack developer with 8+ years of experience crafting robust, scalable, and efficient solutions in the IT realm! From architecting solid backend systems in .NET to tackling front-end interfaces, I bring comprehensive end-to-end expertise to the table.
Whether it‚Äôs database design, cloud/server management, deployment pipelines, or ensuring site reliability, I excel at transforming challenges into high-performing, seamless systems.üöÄ
Some of the technologies I have trained and worked with include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Company: M.P. State Electronics Development Corporation LTD.
Experience.Jobs.Title: Sr. Software Engineer
Description: Worked on integrating Aadhar (OTP, Biometric, and Iris) e-KYC API‚Äôs and Samagra API‚Äôs under MP Shiksha Portal.

Worked on Mukhya Mantri Ladli Bahna Yojna Project under these modules: </br> 1. Payment Module (1000+ Cr amount disbursement per month). </br> 2. Reporting System with (100+ Reports under a month) (1.25+ Cr records can be displayed downloaded with various filters, and according to different user roles). </br> 3. Console Application-based Schedulers to send Messages (every time 1.25+ Cr.), and receive responses from API's.
Worked on Mukhya Mantri Shikho Kamao Yojna on the latest technology including (AWS, Dot.Net MVC, Micro-Service architecture, and so on).
Worked on MP E-Services Portal (Including Anukampa Niyukti Yojna, CM Young Professional Development Program and CTScan Module).
Worked on MatPratishat App‚Äôs Notification Module, Developed Console App for SMS & WhatsApp
Worked on SAMBAL 2.0 Payment and Reporting (Web, SMS, WhatsApp, Email etc.) modules.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Assistant Programmer
Description: Worked on Management and Maintenance of Examination Portals, and Online-Examination Systems.

Developed and Maintaining SLA Penalty Calculation Software in Dot.Net C#, integrated all SLA Clause conditional calculations from scratch with features such as DATATABLE Report Generation ( in PDF, EXCEL formats), Masters to feed data and Internal Emailing restricted to Officers email ID‚Äôs (@mp.gov.in) only.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Senior Software Engineer
Description: Worked on Social Networking Platforms APIs (like Facebook Developer APIs, Twitter, Instagram, Linked In, YouTube, Google Auth, Pinterest, Tiktok, Snapchat) and developed our own APIs and integrated them on front-end with the help of AJAX / JS.
Developed RESTful APIs for android/IOS mobile applications.

Learned to work directly on live servers (Linux), used GIT (like GitHub, GitLab, Bit Bucket) as a version management tool, worked on many more tools like WHMCS, CS6. Worked on WordPress Theme Development too.

Experience.Jobs.Title: PHP Developer
Description: Worked with highly experienced government employees at different client locations (government offices), like MPCDF, MPFSTS, CRISP, Ministry Office, and Collectorate and so on.
Also worked on many different technologies like ASP.NET (C# and VB), JSP, and Servlets, etc.
Used SVN for code version management and also learned windows server management with IIS for hosting and DNS purposes.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Web Developer
Description: Worked with highly experienced web designers and developers to fulfill requirements for the functional elements of Website projects according to client.
Directly Reported to UAE Clients about their specific projects.

FeatureProjects.Title: My Projects
FeatureProjects.Label: ‚≠êHighlighted Project‚≠ê

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: MukhyaMantri Ladli Bahna Yojna
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description:
Aim : Our aim is to build a system to distribute Rs. 1000 Per Woman Per Month in MP (Total 1.25+ Cr. Beneficiaries).
Role : Worked on Payment Module (1000+ Cr amount disbursement per month), Reporting System with (100+ Reports under a month) (1.25+ Cr records can be displayed, downloaded with various filters, and according to different user roles). and Console Application-based Schedulers to send Messages (every time 1.25+ Cr.), and receive responses from API's.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: MukhyaMantri Seekho Kamao Yojna
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description:
Aim : Our aim is to build a system to distribute Rs. 10000 Per Candidate Per Month.
Role : My Role was to develop Reporting System, Console Application-based Schedulers to send Messages (SMS, WhatsApp, Email), and receive responses from API's.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: MP E-Services Portal
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description:
Aim : We aim to build a system for accessing a wide range of MPGov, Making it easier to access 1200+ services from 56+ departments.
Role : My Role was to develop and maintain Anukampa Niyukti Yojna, CM Young Professional Development Program, CTScan, and many more other Modules. Developed Application Forms, Dashboard, and Reporting System in Angular 9 with REST APIs in DotNet Core using Entity Framework with SQL Server. Console Application-based Schedulers to send Messages (SMS, WhatsApp Text and Document, Email).

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: MPAGRO
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description:
Aim : We aim to render the M.P. Agricultural Department‚Äôs Image in such a way that, each citizen of M.P. can say that we are leading the world in agriculture.
Role : Front-end Designing and Backend scripting for a CMS using C# (ASP.NET) on Visual Studio and SQL Server

Contact.Title: Say Hi!
Contact.Content: I will be glad to hear from you if you want to discuss new opportunities. Write to me, and I will respond as soon as I see your message.
